Terms of Service

Last updated on October 5, 2017.

Welcome to Plinkit® (“PLINKIT”, “we,” “us” or “our”). Our mission is to make it simpler to learn about your child’s development and do something about it. Our products, services and website (“Services”) are provided by Plinkit, Inc. (“PLINKIT”), located at 3450 Sacramento St. #150, San Francisco, CA 94118.

By using our Services, you are agreeing to these Terms of Service (“Agreement”). Please read this Agreement carefully. This Agreement is a legal and binding agreement between you and PLINKIT and governs your access to and use of our Services. If you do not agree to this Agreement, you may not use our Services.

Using Our Services

You must comply with this Agreement, our Privacy Policy, and any other policies or guidelines made available to you by PLINKIT. You agree that you are solely responsible for any breach of your obligations under this Agreement and for the consequences of any such breach.

Basic Requirements. To use our Services, you will need a device that meets the system and compatibility requirements, working internet access, and compatible software. Such system requirements are your responsibility.

Age Restrictions. You represent you are of legal age in your jurisdiction of residence to form a binding contract.

Registration. We may request registration information from you before you may access certain areas of our Services, including without limitation to submit orders or to receive information from us via email. You may not register to use our Services if you are under the age of 18. You agree to provide us with true, accurate, current and complete account information and to update that information when necessary. To protect your account, keep your password confidential. You are responsible for the activity that happens on or through your account, including any charges incurred. You agree to immediately notify us of any unauthorized use of your username, password or account or any other breach of security. If you choose a username that, in our sole discretion, is obscene, indecent, abusive or which might otherwise subject us to public disparagement or scorn, we reserve the right, without prior notice to you, to automatically change your username, delete your submissions and/or posts from our Services, deny you access to our Services, or any combination of these options.

Notices. PLINKIT may provide certain notifications, administrative messages, announcements and other information in connection with your use of our Services. You may opt out of some forms of notifications as described in this Agreement and our Privacy Policy.

Privacy. PLINKIT takes your privacy seriously and operates under the policies and principles outlined in our Privacy Policy, which contains important information and disclosures relating to the collection and use of your personally identifiable information in connection with your use of our Services. By using our Services, you agree that PLINKIT can use such data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

You may not use our Services to access or share in any manner any content that: (1) is libelous, defamatory, vulgar or obscene, pornographic, sexually offensive or explicit, harmful or harassing, threatening, hateful, racially, culturally, ethnically or otherwise objectionable or offensive, discriminatory or abusive; (2) violates any law or regulation or the rights of others; (3) causes duress, distress or discomfort to another or is likely to deter or discourage others from using our Services; and/or (4) infringes any intellectual property, proprietary rights or confidentiality obligations of others. You are solely responsible and liable for any such activity.

Misuse. You may use our Services only as permitted by this Agreement and any applicable laws and regulations. You agree that you will not violate or attempt to violate the security of our Services. You agree that you will not engage in any activity that interferes with, alters, modifies or disrupts our Services or any content posted and/or displayed on our Services by us or anyone else. You agree that you will not act in a way that affects or reflects negatively on PLINKIT, our Services, or anyone else. You agree that you will not attempt to collect any information from other users of our Services or send unsolicited e-mail or other information, including promotions or advertising to other users of our Services without their express consent. You agree not to use our Services for any commercial purposes unless you obtain PLINKIT’s prior written approval. We may suspend or stop providing our Services to you if you fail to comply with this Agreement or our policies, or if we are investigating you for suspected misuse of our Services.

Linking. You may create a hyperlink to our Services so long as you do not portray PLINKIT or our Services in a false, misleading, derogatory, or otherwise offensive matter. You may not use any PLINKIT trademark, logo or other proprietary intellectual property (i.e. images or designs) as part of the link without PLINKIT’S express written permission. You agree you will not frame or mirror any part of our Services without our express prior written consent.

Using the Services does not give you ownership of any intellectual property rights in our Services or the content you access through our Services. You may not use content from our Services unless you obtain permission from its owner or are otherwise permitted by law. You agree that you will not duplicate or otherwise reproduce or sell the Services or the content you access through our Services.

PLINKIT offers products to customers via our Services. The ability of customers to place orders via our Services is only available to persons residing in the United States of America. This includes buying any products or services offered or sold as part of, or through, our Services.

Every child is different; every parent, teacher and child development expert is different. You agree that we are not responsible for the success or failure of you or your child’s behavior or actions, or any other result of any kind that you may have as a result of information presented to you on the Service.
